attributes.action: Force the FA to organise school football leagues
attributes.background: The health of school children is getting worse and worse each year. Sport needs become more of a focus on the school curriculum and more extra curriculum activities need to be organised. Football is the most popular sport in the UK. More participation is needed, so force the FA to organise leagues

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament can't force the FA to take this action. You could start a new petition calling on the Government to urge the FA to organise school football leagues.
